short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flags tweets written by accounts which have been noted in blockchain investigations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TweetyMask provides a helpful flag to indicate when a tweet being viewed on twitter.com has been authored by an account featured by prominent blockchain investigators, such as ZachXBT. 

It also gives you the option of removing promoted tweets from your feed, a common source of crypto scams.

It's dangerous to go alone... take this!
